Work: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Author: J. K. Rowling
Notes: Aragog was an Acromantula - an enormous , sentient spider capable of speech - who made a unique clicking noise as he moved in search of prey . Hagrid raised him from an egg as a Hogwarts student . In his third year at Hogwarts , Hagrid was caught talking to Aragog in the dungeons by Tom Riddle , who alleged that Aragog was the Monster of Slytherin and that Hagrid had opened the Chamber of Secrets
